rooms.description: The entrance area is spacious and incorporates Scandinavian simplicity with clean lines, natural light accentuating the interior. It serves as a transitional space from outdoors to indoors.
A large living room that combines functional Scandinavian design elements with open-plan style for social gatherings. Vastu alignment ensures energy flows positively.
An integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living area, designed with minimalistic decor and natural lighting.
A modern Scandinavian-style kitchen featuring efficient layout and ample storage. Vastu principles guide the placement of appliances for optimal energy flow.
A guest bedroom designed with a simple yet elegant style, ensuring privacy and comfort. Natural materials and soft color palettes are used.
The primary suite includes an en-suite bathroom and closet space; designed to optimize sleep and relaxation using Scandinavian design principles and Vastu positioning for serenity.
A private bathing area attached to the master bedroom, featuring clean lines and efficient fixtures with attention to Vastu water placement guidelines.
A dedicated workspace or study area that balances functionality with Scandinavian design aesthetics, ensuring a distraction-free environment.
Dedicated space for domestic helpers, designed to be compact yet comfortable with essential amenities and Vastu alignment for positive energy flow.

openings.description: Large glass front door that invites natural light while providing security. It follows local building norms and Vastu guidelines by aligning with the positive directions.
Multiple window openings designed to ensure ample daylight, enhance energy flow per Vastu, and provide a Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic.
A balcony with clear glass balustrade providing outdoor access; design considers structural integrity in accordance with local codes.
Well-defined staircase that leads to the first floor, positioned as per Vastu recommendations for optimal energy circulation and emergency egress compliance.
